text: "Yonkers" is a song by Odd Future's frontman Tyler, The Creator. It is from his first studio album Goblin. It features hardcore lyrics and also contains insults directed at singers Hayley Williams of the band Paramore, Bruno Mars and rapper B.o.B. This song is the one that Odd Future gained mainstream success with. It was high on the Billboard charts, but lost to Katy Perry's Firework. In response to the insults, B.o.B. made a song entitled "No Future". == Other websites == * Category:2011 songs Category:Hip hop songs Category:Diss tracks
title: Yonkers (song)
